title: newActor/Actress
company: The Fort Museum of the NWMP and First Nations...
description:
About Us

The Fort Museum of the NWMP and First Nations Interpretive Centre is a non-profit museum and archives in Southern Alberta dedicated to the early histories of Fort Macleod, the Blackfoot, and the North West Mounted Police.

Job Description

The Fort Museum is looking for Actors to join their team; this is a seasonal, full-time position for 35 hours/week. This position is for May and June only. The Actors will be responsible for delivering an educational and entertaining program “March of the Redcoats” presented to school and public groups consisting of a live theater play followed by interactive scenarios. We strive to deliver a program that will engage school children and visitors alike and encourage renewed interest in local history.

Actors will be responsible for preparing the set, costumes, and equipment needed for each day they perform for the visiting public. They will also be responsible for the set up and take down of props within the facility. If time allows, Actors will be required to offer tours of the museum as well.

Qualifications

Candidates must be self-motivated individuals who can work as part of a team. Candidates with acting experience or training are preferred, but not mandatory. Knowledge and interest in local NWMP and Blackfoot history is an asset. Candidates are required to pass a criminal record check.

These positions are offered in part by the Young Canada Works in Heritage Organizations grant and therefore we are looking for students that are currently enrolled full-time in post-secondary studies and are planning to return to studies in the upcoming year.

How to Apply

The Fort Museum recognizes the importance of being an equal opportunities employer free from bias and judgment. The Museum will not discriminate against any person with respect to the designated protected grounds. The Museum will try, where feasible, to eliminate systemic barriers to advancement and/or redress the under-utilization of designated groups.

Position offered for May – June only.

Job Types: Full-time, Seasonal
Contract length: 2 months

Salary: $15.00 per hour

Schedule:

  • Monday to Friday

Ability to commute/relocate:

  • Fort Macleod, AB T0L 0Z0: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (preferred)

Expected start date: 2022-05-02
skills: ['How to Apply', 'Candidates must be self-motivated individuals who can work as part of a team. Candidates with acting experience or training are preferred, but not mandatory. Knowledge and interest in local NWMP and Blackfoot history is an asset. Candidates are required to pass a criminal record check.', 'Expected start date: 2022-05-02']

title: Internet Celebrity & Short Video Actor/Actress
description:
VanPeople Network Ltd. is a leading online media company provider with a branded network of localized platforms targeting local Vancouver Chinese users. VanPeople.com consists of 6 major online platforms which focus on providing an array of services in different categories. Our channels include the website (vanpeople.com), iOS/Android APP, 3 WeChat channels (100,000+ followers in total), and Weibo (50,000+ followers), which cover 500,000+ Chinese users in the Greater Vancouver Area.

What are we going to recruit?

Internet Celebrity & Short Video Actor/Actress

What you will be doing:

  • As an actor or actress in all Douyin short videos shooting, commercial advertisement production and some company business activities with good performance.
  • Record voiceover in all video content
  • Live streaming

What we require you have:

  • Own high proficiency in acting in different types of short video shooting
  • Being confident when you face the camera
  • You are a creative person when you act your own roles in our video and express an interesting and unique style
  • You are familiar with film aesthetics and you need to know how to act in different environments.
  • Have live stream or host experience and be capable to attract audiences’ attention and leading opinion.
  • Can speak English fluently
  • Being familiar with the unique features of Vancouver

What we prefer you have:

1. Personal social media platform such as Tiktok, YouTube, Facebook and Instagram owns more than 5k followers

2. More than half of a year of work experience in a live stream company

3. Relative education background in Visual and Performing Arts or Film production

4. Relative talent on dance, music or instruments

Education requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree
  • Or performing school or college

Application requirements:

Need to speak Mandarin, basic English

Come to Vancouver for more than 2 years

Familiar with the Internet industry Priorities with relevant new media experience

Please provide your portfolio with a resume (must include your own full-body picture and head shoot)

Why Join Us?

1. We have strong characteristics and we are striving to be a leading overseas local information platform. In the past few years, we have rapidly grown into a recognized network information platform in the Greater Vancouver area. We are still in rapid development and we are constantly introducing new projects.

As a start-up company, you will have enough space to grow. Our management is flat, so you will have the most core practicing opportunities. In our company, what you get is not only a salary but also a valuable career experience and the accumulation of important relationships.
We provide a competitive salary. Our company has a very stable revenue and profits, so we can offer a decent salary base on your performance. there is no politics here, and performance is everything.
We have a relaxed work environment, and we provide flexible working hours. As long as your task can be achieved, you can come to work early or late. Our internet technology team is young, energetic, and passionate. we have rapidly developed into a high-value, high-efficiency and high-output team within a few years.
Furthermore, there are lots of benefits joining our team, regularly employee gatherings, concert tickets, major local events, movie tickets, new store tryouts, etc... Do not hesitate, the person we are looking for is you!

In VanPeople, our faith is Work Hard, Play Harder! Welcome to join us! And let's be colleagues!

Training will be provided. If you meet these qualifications, please send your resume and references to hr at vanpeople.com.

Also, please prepare for a brief introduction (tell us 1. why are you a good candidate for this job, 2. how can you meet those qualifications, and 3. something about relative experience, current identity, and career plan)

Job Types: Full-time or Part-time

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent, Freelance
Part-time hours: 20-40 per week

Salary: $18.00-$50.00 per hour

Benefits:

  • Casual dress
  • Discounted or free food
  • Flexible schedule

title: Part Time Cast Member - Cinema City Movies 12
description:
Job Description

We count on our Cast Members to ensure Cineplex Entertainment provides each and every guest with an exceptional entertainment experience. The Cineplex atmosphere is energetic, big, fast-paced, social, exciting and positive.  

We are currently recruiting part-time positions for this theatre. If you love the movies and enjoy working with the public, then we have opportunities that would be perfect for you. If this is the opportunity you’ve been looking for – Don’t Wait!! Apply Today!

Qualifications

What does it take to be a successful member of the Cineplex Team?

  • You are team oriented Energetic Friendly and outgoing
  • You enjoy working in a fast paced, guest service environment
  • You are available to work late on weekends and some late weeknights
  • You possess superior communication skills
  • Successful candidates will enjoy free movies, competitive wages, flexible hours, tuition assistance and cash incentive programs
  • Pro Serve Certification and being of legal age to serve alcohol in fully licensed theatres would be an asset


Additional Information

Inclusion & Diversity 

Cineplex is an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We encourage and welcome applications from all intersectional walks of life. The collective sum of our individual differences, experiences, knowledge, innovation, self-expression, unique capabilities, and talent represents a significant part of our culture. By valuing a diverse workforce, we enforce hiring practices that are fair and equitable. 

Life at Cineplex:

Cineplex is synonymous with entertainment. Known as Canada’s largest and most innovative film exhibitor, we’re so much more than movies – operating The Rec Room, Canada’s favourite destination for ‘Eats & Entertainment’ and Playdium, specially designed for teens and families. 

At Cineplex, change and disruption are nothing new. Infusing innovation into everything we do has fueled our evolution as a fully-integrated, diversified and growing organization with exciting career opportunities in our locations and corporate functions. Grow with us and explore roles in operations, food services, hospitality, digital commerce (CineplexStore.com), digital (Cineplex Digital Media) and cinema media (Cineplex Media), consumer loyalty (SCENE), finance, human resources, technology, amusement solutions (Player One Amusement Group), and more.

Proudly recognized as having one of the country’s Most Admired Corporate Cultures, we rally behind our values of Teamwork, Innovation and Excellence. 

We are creative, curious and love thinking big. The next evolution of Cineplex starts here, with you. 

Learn more about our businesses through the links below. 

Cineplex | Cineplex Digital Media |  | Cineplex Media | Cineplex Store | Player One Amusement Group | Playdium | The Rec Room | SCENE 

 

Successful candidates will enjoy free movies, competitive wages, comprehensive training programs, and tuition assistance. If you love the movies and enjoy working with the public, then this opportunity would be perfect for you. Don’t Wait!! Apply Today!

While we appreciate all interest, only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.

title: Animateur·trice 3D - Stage Été 2022
description:
As an Animator at Behaviour, you will bring to life a large variety of characters and objects for our game in production. If you want to take part in our project, make sure you submit your portfolio and come play with us!   

In this role you will:

  • Apply effectively animation principles to create high quality animations;
  • Adapt your work  to create new animations based on existing brands; 
  • Edit the animations within a game engine (Unity or Unreal).

What we're looking for:

  • Academic or professionnal experience in making animations demonstrated by your portfolio;
  • Good knowledge of human and creatures anatomy;
  • Knowledge of Maya;
  • Knowledge of Unity/Unreal engine is a plus.
  • Passion for animation and video games;

Dans ce rôle vous devrez:

  • Appliquer de façon efficace les principes de base de l’animation afin de créer un produit de haute qualité;
  • Comprendre les intentions du design de jeu et pouvoir créer les listes d’animations requises pour des personnages simples;
  • Intégrer tes animations dans un moteur de jeu (Unity ou Unreal).

Ce que nous recherchons :

  • Expérience académique ou professionnelle dans la production d’animation dans un jeu vidéo;
  • Portfolio démontrant une bonne connaissance des principes de l’animation ;
  • Bonne connaissance de l’anatomie humaine et des créatures;
  • Expérience avec Maya;
  • Connaissance d’Unity ou Unreal, un atout.

Pour être considéré.e pour cette opportunité de stage tu dois :   
  • Joindre un portfolio à ton application; 
  • Être éligible à travailler au Canada au moment de soumettre ta candidature; 
  • Être disponible pour travailler 37.5 heures par semaines. 

Les dates de stage sont flexibles, dépendamment des besoins d’affaires ainsi que des disponibilités des candidats. 
En tant qu’animateur chez Behaviour, tu donneras vie à une grande variété de personnages et d’objets pour un jeu en production. Si tu veux prendre part à notre projet, assures-toi d’inclure un portfolio au moment de postuler et viens jouer avec nous !
